DOC.brief_summary: Background : Latent myofascial trigger point ( MTrPs ) levator scapulae high prevalent may influence neck shoulder condition . The pressure release one recommend manual therapy technique . Objective : To determine time effect pressure release technique application latent MTrPs levator scapula muscle . Design : A three-arm ( 1:1:1 ratio ) , double-blinded , parallel , randomized clinical trial . The manual technique u apply , sustain digital pressure thumb 2nd-3rd finger PGM pain threshold gradually increase ceiling tissue resistance ( barrier ) , decrease , add pressure . different time sustained pressure number repetition depend time 30 ( group 1 , act control ) , 60 ( group 2 ) 90 second ( group 3 ) shall apply .
DOC.brief_title: Time Effect Pressure Release Technique Application Latent Myofascial Trigger Points
DOC.criteria: Subjects age 18 60 year . Subjects presence latent PGM levator scapula muscle . Pregnant . Subjects spontaneous pain . Subjects neck shoulder pain . Subjects musculoskeletal injury . Subjects neurological problem . Fibromyalgia
